reviews.review: La verdad, hay que decir que es uno de los mejores juegos que he jugado y todav√≠a no lo termino de jugar se volvio m√≠ juego favorito y es lo mejor que he probado

What else can I say about this DECADE old beaut? Team Fortress 2 is a unique FPS Game, and honestly a chaotic clusterfun of 9 different classes brawing in a blistering 60s style world. Before even giving it a try however, I'd watch the 9 meet the team videos before you touch the game. Seeing those amazing shorts for the first time is something special, and really shells what I love most about this game: the humor.
My life is ruined, but this game is pretty good

This game is really fun to play with friends, but it can be played solo aswell. The artstyle is also good as, and its free so there is nothing to loose other than hours of your life and even maybe your family, but they are nothing in front of this game. 8/10.
Got this game for buying a bundle :3 , Played by @egoenk

THE Valve game. An amazing First Person Shooter, with countless ways to customize your game. Literally thousands of ways to play, thanks to the item and class systems. The systems also allow you to look in very unique ways, of which there are probbably milions. Unless you play an unhealthy amount, it never gets boring. Truly a spectacle of the source engine.
i've played it for a good while. one of my favorites.
its good do i need to say anything else
Not as fun as it used to be unless volvo can fix

I've been playing TF2 since August 2016. TF2 has been so fun, and I played the heck out of the game even if I had school. I also made so many memories while playing the game. When I had nothing to do: play TF2. When it was late: play TF2. When I woke up: play TF2. It is very fun to play TF2!

Que decir de este juego? uff!!
es demasiado divertido y tan adictivo, te podes quedar un rato jugando sin ninguna preocupacion, pero cuando te das cuenta ya tenes m√°s de mil horas. Jajajaa, Simpatizas demasiado con los personajes y cada uno tiene su caracter. Sin dudas un gran juego que todos tienen que probar.
 Sin embargo me molesta bastante el hecho de que valve lo tiene un poco abandonadito, pero luego recuerdas que es un juego del 2007 y se te pasa.

This game is a timeless masterpiece, a marvel of a game, an excellent example of how to make an FPS class based shooter and a brilliant way to have fun, no matter how you choose to play.
Other than that, the game:
‚Ä¢ is Free
‚Ä¢ has an amazing and dedicated Community
‚Ä¢ features tons of high-quality maps and game modes
‚Ä¢ has a lot of weapons and unique playstyles, and in general varying character customization, with only 9 lovable and memorable classes
‚Ä¢ and a distinguishable skill ceiling, but even more importantly, a low skill floor

The only "con" I can tell is the lack of frequent balance changes, although I've gotten used to it and not to mention, the game is already relatively balanced.

I think that keeping a hero shooter fresh with new weapons instead of heroes is extremely underrated, and that the idea that TF2 brings on the concept of Hero Shooters is unfairly overshadowed by other games' inferior game design.

"This game is one of the last bastions of classic FPS where you can just frag, hang out, and have a good time without needing to sweat over some artifitial ranking." And that is the reason I fully endorse it's casual nature and don't have issues with it, not even with RNG mechanics like random crits and random bullet spread.
Its matchmaking system was built in the Middle Ages.

The borderline of pc gaming. If had never played tf2 before, u have never experienced pc gaming before. You hav to play tf2. It might be 10 years old, but dont let the release date discourage u. Look at pokemon for instance. It is older but still insanely popular.
One of my all time favorites, fun gameplay and a good game to just sit down on the weekend and play for 6 hours.
I've played this game for over 1700 hours. send help.

BEST GAME EVER !!!
keep up the good work valve and dont give up on this game

If you have 1,000 hours or higher in this game I don't think it's hard to understand that you like the game A LOT. Honestly what's not to like about a first person cartoon like shooter as goofy, hilarious, and stupidly fun as this game is. I don't know a lot of people who own a steam profile and haven't played this game before (since you know it's free to play). BUT if you haven't... do yourself a favor and download this game right now. Do it. Please...You know you want to...Just do it already I can't keep typing forever here.

Fun and free game. Losers like to say that because you didn't waste hundreds of dollars on cosmetics you are lesser than them. Just tell them to fuck off and ignore the stupid cunts. I have no problem with people buying cosmetics, but when they're cunts about it, it's annoying. Also, for new players, don't buy anything from the TF2 market, use Scrap.tf or something like it. This game is also better with a friend.

This is a great game for both people who are somewhat new to FPS games while still catering to veterans with a very high skill celing. One problem with this game i must point out is that it lacks almost any reliable source of information for new players (And the in game training mode is bugged and only talks about the abilitys of 4 of the 9 classes). I still love this game and would give it a 9/10.

Valve knows Free2Play. Team Fortress 2 hold amazing gameplay without any of the bull shite seen in other Free2Play games. Due to it's price and great comunity I couldn't recommend TF2 more and I feel a gaming computer without TF2 isn't complete!
Tiene sus problemas pero sigue siendo un muy buen juego

Team Fortress 2 is a masterpeice. The art style is unique and easily identafiable. The way in which the gameplay is crafted is almost perfect, most primary weapons are one shot weapons which gives off the satifaction you get from using a shotgun in other FPS games. Each playable character has there own unique speeds, weapons, movement, and even personalaties. And best off all, the game is free! meaning there is no reason for you not to check out Team Fortress 2.

Unfortunatley due to Valve's continued silence, and a new cheating bot issue which valve refuses to fix, I can't recommend this game. I love it to death, but if you are a new player: If and until valve decides to fix the problem, You should look for other games.
